profile_positions.description:
Working in research (within the lectorate Automotive Research) and teaching.
Member of the medezeggenschapsraad (participation council). Previously member of the academy council, faculty council, and exam committee.

Research:
Setting up and running research project in cooperation with other research institutes and industrial partners, such as:
- Project MultiTec; on multimaterials solutions to lightweight vehicle structures (design & durability) 
- Project ComplAid; on repair of composite materials in automotive applications. 
- Project "Schadebedrijf van de toekomst" (BRSOT); on developments in materials, joining , and repair in automotive bodywork repair shops.
- Project "Lightweight Suspension".
- Project LIFE; on fatigue in trailers.

Teaching Materials Science, Mechanics of Materials, Joining Technology, Production Technology, and (Lightweight) Design at all levels (B Eng & M Eng) in Dutch and English.
Additionally:
- Supervising thesis-projects.
- Supervising minor-projects.
- Supervising internships;
- Set up of M Eng Light Weight Design within the Master of Automotive Systems (MAS).
Previously:
- Member of Board of Examiners (examencommissie).
- Member of the Curriculum Committee (Curriculum Commissie Automotive).
profile_positions.title: Researcher & Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
Research on joining of steel and aluminium for automotive and aerospace applications. Project leader for various projects involving the development and implementation of new technology.
First mostly brazing of aluminium. Later focus on welding and steel, specifically modelling and simulation of welding of aluminium and steel (in combination with PhD project).
International cooperation, development of new products & applications, customer & production support.

At Corus RD&T I was the president of the trade union.
profile_positions.title: (Principal) Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Worked in an Internal Software House, mostly in development and maintenance of software platforms (for development & testing) and testing of remote banking tools.

At ING I was the editor of a newsletter for the internal software house.
profile_positions.title: ICT Engineer

profile_positions.description: Internship; developing a testing method for vacuum forming of polymer sheet materials.
profile_positions.title: Intern
